message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee its quality due to the inherent uncertainty, our historical data shows that our products generally meet high standards. Given the unique nature of this item, I kindly request $1000000 for it. Should you choose to make the purchase, please be aware that once completed, there will be no refunds. Thank you for considering our product.
